tool_description: Analyzes the structure and content of a contract template, breaking down clauses and identifying customizable sections.

template_id.description: Unique identifier of the template to analyze

analysis_depth.description: Level of analysis: summary, detailed, comprehensive

include_metadata.description: Whether to include template metadata in analysis

clause_categorization.description: Whether to categorize clauses by type and purpose

identify_variables.description: Whether to identify customizable variables and placeholders

risk_assessment.description: Whether to include preliminary risk assessment of clauses

language_complexity.description: Whether to analyze language complexity and readability

error_messages: Template not found: The specified template_id does not exist in the repository.
Invalid analysis depth: Use summary, detailed, or comprehensive.
Template access error: Unable to access template content due to permissions or corruption.
Analysis failed: Template format is incompatible with analysis engine.
usage: Provide template_id and configure analysis options through boolean parameters. The tool will return structured analysis of the template content including clauses, variables, and metadata.

clause_count.description: Total number of clauses in the template

clause_types.description: Categories of clauses present in the template

customizable_fields.description: List of fields that can be customized

template_structure.description: Overall structure and organization of the template

recommended_modifications.description: Suggested modifications for common use cases
